name: Don't F@$# With Poseidon
description:
[Content Warning: Contains numerous flashing lights and sounds]

You're a wizard pirate, trapped at sea until you see the god water. You think to yourself "Eh, why not." and give the old man the middle one. Not your smartest idea.

Now you must evade his infinite army of sea creatures and 2 bosses all while all while harvesting his dead onslaught's mana, health and reflector shields.

Made using Gamemaker Studio 2; Kenny Art Assets; SFXR; and Beepbox

Movement: Arrow Keys

Mana Burst: Space Bar
